issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Platform tab loses the navigation bar after clicking on 'Application events'. This is not regression since the issue occurs in 3.0.0 GA as well

Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchensink application.
2. Click on Platform tab. The navigation bar exists.
3. Click 'Application events' under platform tab. The navigation bar disappears.
4. Now click anywhere under platform. The navigation bar does not exist.

Expected:
Navigation bar should exist.
fields.summary: IOS: Kitchensink - Platform tab loses the navigation bar after clicking on 'Application events'

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
